message:
A Gazan wrote about Qaid's release:

عقبال شعب غزة  يهرب من خاطفيه

May the people of Gaza escape from their captors (referring to Hamas - AA).

There are also Gazans who are happy about the release because they believe that after the last of the Israeli abductees is released from the hands of Hamas, the war will end.

Sinwar continues to lose assets.
The IDF's military action brings results.
As far as Hamas is concerned, this is a great shame. On the one hand, Hamas insists on negotiations and does not budge, and on the other hand, its bargaining power is decreasing.
Its military image here is damaged. Hamas struggles to keep its most valuable bargaining chips: live hostages.

I am waiting to hear Qaid speak in the media, in the Arabic language, and share what he went through. It has a great value in terms of information and awareness.

Celebrate life unapologetically, Qaid!
الحمد لله على السلامة

Welcome back Qaid.
It's so good to have you home.

Joint IDF and ISA Announcement:

Cleared for Publication: Today (Tuesday), the IDF and ISA rescued the hostage Qaid Farhan Alkadi, aged 52, from Rahat, who was abducted by the Hamas terror organization into the Gaza Strip on October 7th.

Qaid Farhan Alkadi was rescued by Shayetet 13, the 401st Brigade, Yahalom, and ISA forces under the command of the 162nd Division in a complex operation in the southern Gaza Strip.

No further details can be published due to considerations of the safety of our hostages, the security of our forces, and national security.

He is in a stable medical condition and is being transferred for medical checks at a hospital. His family has been updated with the details, and the IDF is accompanying them.

Israeli security forces will continue to operate with all means to bring home the hostages.
Additional documentation of the attack on the Salhi family home in Nuseirat.
A-Salhi family home 👆 in Nuseirat after the attack.
The attack on the home of the Adel al-Salhi family in Nuseirat a short time ago following an evacuation warning.

According to Palestinian channels covering the Rafah area - large parts of the city have turned into ash and dirt, simply sandy areas without buildings (after the IDF destroyed them - AA)

This is what it says:
مدينة رفح عبارة عن مدينة رملية في المحاور الاتية ( مخيم يبنا والشابورة ومحيط المحور والعبد جبر ومنطقة عوض الله ومخيم اسدود ومنقطة حي قشطة ومنطقة حي السلام

Translation: The city of Rafah is actually a "city of sand" (no buildings, only sand - AA) in the following directions: Yabna camp, a-Shaboura and its surroundings, al-Abd Jaber, Awadallah area, Ashdod "camp", Qishta neighborhood area, and a-Salem neighborhood area.

##
The IDF's bulldozers in Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip are working with great vigor.

Mark Zuckerberg's company Meta (Facebook, WhatsApp and Instagram), admits in an official letter that the Biden-Harris administration pressured it to censor content about Covid-19 and the issue of the laptop of Hunter Biden, the president's son (in which evidence of drug offenses and more was found).

A cartoon mocking Hezbollah's response to the elimination of its top commander Fuad Shukr:

On Nasrallah's scale, the chicken is equal to (or even heavier than) Shukr's head...
Jordan announces that it will send four trucks of prosthetics to a clinic in Khan Yunis for amputees in the Gaza Strip, whose number is estimated at 14 thousand - as a result of the ongoing war.

Channels identified with Hamas:

 مجموعة من المستوطنون يقيمون بؤرة استيطانية في منطقة الخان الأحمر بمدينة القدس المحتلة.

"A group of settlers established an outpost in the Khan Alahamar area in occupied Jerusalem"

Lebanese sources: one seriously injured and two lightly wounded in an Israeli UAV attack in the area of al-Mjadel in ​​southern Lebanon.
Another injured in the IDF attack in Chihine in southern Lebanon.

Trump presents a "new purchase" from the Democratic Party:
Tulsi Gabbard

20 years in the Democratic Party, served in the US Army and the National Guard. Submitted a bid for a presidency to the Democratic Party in 2019 and gave it up in favor of Biden's candidacy.
Left the Democratic Party in 2022.

US Joint Chiefs of Staff:
The chances of an all-out war in the region have decreased after the attack carried out by Hezbollah.

Hezbollah released a video last night documenting the rocket fire it carried out on August 23 at the Ein Zeit base.
It can be seen that the launcher is buried in the ground, with a moving opening door that is covered with camouflaging material.

"He wanted to pay off the debt to the residents of Gaza who were the reason for his release.

He was arrested twice. First time for ten days. He was released and after a week he was arrested again and then released in "Tufan Al-Aqsa" with some of the guys, some of whom have already become martyrs - his friends Tarek Daoud, Wael Masha.
Jibril decided that he would never surrender and never betray himself... When he left the house my father asked him, are you sure of the path you want to follow?
Jibril answered him: How did I get out of prison?
He said: You were released in the deal.
He answered him: Now I have to pay off my debt.

And thank God, God accepted him and he was martyred.
It was long expected that he would be a martyr. We knew that a long time ago.
When he was 10-11 years old, Jibril saw the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. The prophet took him to Al-Aqsa, fought alongside him (against the Jews. This is what his father also said in a separate video -AA) and told him that he would be a martyr.
The explanation was that he would be a martyr at the age of 18.
And really, Jibril turned 18 on July 13.
We knew the martyrs would die.
Praise be to God, we are proud of him, and our heads are lifted up because of it.
He (in his death) reserved for us an entrance to heaven. Our family has now had 70 of its people enter heaven.
A thousand more will come like Jibril."

"Jibril wanted to pay off his debt for those who brought about his release in the deal"

In the attached video, we see the brother of the terrorist Jibril Jibril, a Hamas operative, who was released in the last deal in November (the minors and women deal with Hamas), explaining the "debt" that Jibril felt towards the one who brought about his release, the loyalty towards him, which motivated him to carry out attacks until he "martyred." This was his mindset. This is expected to be the mindset of many of those who will be released (or have already been released in deals with Hamas). The release as part of a deal moves the released with tremendous motivation in a very specific direction.
Ask the highly motivated freedman from the Shalit deal - Yahya Sinwar.

Below is a translation of the brother's words 👇

Jibril Jibril (in the middle) was a close friend of Wael Masha and Tarek Daoud:
All three were released in the last deal with Hamas.
All three subsequently joined the military wing of Hamas.
All three have carried out attacks against Israelis since they were released.
All three were eliminated by the IDF in the last month.

👇👇👇

Last night's airstrike in Nur Shams in Tulkarm - these are the 5 terrorists who were killed - all of them military operatives.
On the upper left, circled in red, is Jibril Jibril, an operative of the military wing of Hamas, who was released in the last hostage deal with Hamas in November - I will expand on him immediately 👇
